A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Once again i was disappoibted by disneys atar wars movie. A once great story with a sensitiv canonical storyline became once more the point of interesst of individual political opinions. The last jedi is for me just like a james bond movie\, portrayed without a white\, middle-aged\, charismatic heterosexual englishman\, but with a indian-british ugly annoying homosexual as Bond. Changing the basic of a storylime doesn't work and i am really sorry once again to have been wasting roughly $30 in a swiss movie theater watching this movie. Never agin\, no more disney-star wars until they return to the canonical storyline.
